name: Ghosts ARRn't Real
description:
Brackeys GameJam Submission 2022.1

By Thetra00

THEME: It's not Real!

Pirats don t have it easy! They get robbed by their own kin and so there has to be a guard on the ship, every night! 

And sometimes, the Night gets very long and you hear things which are not real! 

There are no Ghosts! Just take your Lamp to the noice and you will see, the scary things will vanish! 

Here the Crew:

 - ye Scallywag!

 - yo Captain!

The Unreal Crew:

 - Captain "Bigbeard" Bonko  aka "The Boss"

 - Bandana Johns - his bandana was so cool, even Death wears one now.

 - Qickfinger Tompson - even death  himself chased after him to get him.

 - Deadleg Sempson  - people say, he was to slow to recognice that he is dead.

--------------- How to PLAY: ---------------

The Captain will tell you what to do on the Title Screen.

  • Move around: a & d  is left and right
  • Drop through platforms: hold s while standing on a platform
  • Jump: hit Space - you can Doublejump!
--------------- Survival Hints ---------------
  • Ghosts will attack the Chests or chase you if you get to close. They will either punch you or the chest, so be carefull when you approach them.
  • Do not jump at Ghost - you will fall through them.
  • Your vision will get worse if you don t drink enough grog! if you can get ghosts in your lightcircle they will vanish, propably... and they will take away a little of your vision!  If your vision is at 0 the ghost will be faster! 
  • The red  grog will replenish a little of your health!
  • The game ends if you have no life left or all the chests are destroyed.
--------------- Good Luck on your Watch ---------------

I hope you have a lot of fun with my new Game,

Cheers Thetra.
